entities.name: kreachercould
entities.description: Kreacher is a house-elf who has escaped from the lake of Inferi. He is described as not returning to the house for several days.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is confident that the capture of Mundungus would take a few hours at most. He is anxious and discouraged when Kreacher does not return.

entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: Mundungus is a location where Harry expects to find someone, but it is not clear who or what Mundungus is.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione tries various unsuccessful Transfigurations on moldy bread for supper.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as someone who would be sent by the Death Eaters if they knew Harry and his friends were in the house.

relationships.description: Harry expects to find someone at Mundungus.
Kreacher has escaped from the lake of Inferi.
